articles.author: Jon Jackson
articles.title: NATO Country Leader Endorses China's Peace Plan for Russia-Ukraine War - Newsweek
articles.description: Hungary's prime minister criticized other European leaders for being "on the side of war."
articles.content:
Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orbán on Thursday said he supports China's peace proposal for ending Russia's war against Ukraine.
Orbán, one of the few leaders in NATOwho is sympathetic to Russian … [+3718 chars]
